chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
iteres : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> prechain A
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
prechain_last : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A
power : forall A : Set, (A -> A) -> A -> nat -> A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
lazy_power_eg_power : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n
MapFlag_sum : forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x
MapCollect_as_Fold : forall (A B : Type) (f : ad -> A -> Map B) (m : Map A), MapCollect A B f m = MapFold A (Map B) (M0 B) (MapMerge B) f m
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
dist_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y)
incr_concat : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> prechain_incr A r (concat A p x)
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y
dist_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
MapFold_orb : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A), MapFold A bool false orb f m = match MapSweep A f m with | Some _ => true | None => false end
MapFold_canon_1 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 : Map B), mapcanon B m0 -> forall op : Map B -> Map B -> Map B, (forall m1 : Map B, mapcanon B m1 -> forall m2 : Map B, mapcanon B m2 -> mapcanon B (op m1 m2)) -> forall f : ad -> A -> Map B, (forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon B (f a y)) -> forall (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), mapcanon B (MapFold1 A (Map B) m0 op f pf m)
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
MapFold_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m0 : Map B), mapcanon B m0 -> forall op : Map B -> Map B -> Map B, (forall m1 : Map B, mapcanon B m1 -> forall m2 : Map B, mapcanon B m2 -> mapcanon B (op m1 m2)) -> forall f : ad -> A -> Map B, (forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon B (f a y)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon B (MapFold A (Map B) m0 op f m)
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) ->...-> P m m0 p
MapCard_Remove_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (n n' : nat), m' = MapRemove A m a -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n = n'} + {n = S n'}
MapCard_Put_behind_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (n n' : nat), m' = MapPut_behind A m a y -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n' = n} + {n' = S n}
MapCard_Put_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (n n' : nat), m' = MapPut A m a y -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n' = n} + {n' = S n}
non_dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (concat A (single A x) x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), P (concat A (concat A z x) x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, non_dist_chain A p -> P p
prechain_incr_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), P r (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> P r p -> P r (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), prechain_incr A m p -> P m p
lazy_power : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A -> bool) -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> Map A
DMerge : forall A : Type, Map (Map A) -> Map A
lazy_power_aux : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A -> bool) -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> MapFlag A
Inductive prechain_dom_ok (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop := domok_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x) | domok_concat : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> prechain_dom_ok A T (concat A p x) For prechain_dom_ok: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For domok_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For domok_concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
fix_point : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> Prop
iteres_0 : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> prechain A
Inductive chain (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := chain_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) | chain_concat_s : forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y ->...-> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y) For chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For chain_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]

```coq
forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n.
Proof.
intros A f x n.
induction n as [|n IHn].
- simpl. rewrite <- lazy_power_eg_power_0 with (egalite := fun a b => a = b) (f := f) (x := x) (n := O). intros.
  destruct (lazy_power_aux A (fun a b => a = b) f x O) eqn:H1.
  + destruct H1 as [H2 | H2].
    * apply lazy_power_eg_power_0 in H2. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
    * apply lazy_power_eg_power_0 in H2. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
  + contradiction.
- simpl. rewrite IHn. rewrite <- lazy_power_eg_power_0 with (egalite := fun a b => a = b) (f := f) (x := x) (n := S n). intros.
  destruct (lazy_power_aux A (fun a b => a = b) f x (S n)) eqn:H1.
  + destruct H1 as [H2 | H2].
    * apply lazy_power_eg_power_0 in H2. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
    * apply lazy_power_eg_power_0 in H2. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
  + contradiction.
Qed.
